org.metaborg.spoofax.shell.client.console

Class TerminalUserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.metaborg.spoofax.shell.client.console.TerminalUserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplay, IEditor

    public class TerminalUserInterface
extends Object
implements IEditor, IDisplay
    A terminal UI which is both an IEditor and an IDisplay.

      • TerminalUserInterface

        @Inject
public TerminalUserInterface(jline.console.ConsoleReader reader,
                                     OutputStream out,
                                     OutputStream err,
                                     JLine2InputHistory hist)
                              throws IOException
        Parameters:
        reader - The jline2 ConsoleReader used to get input.
        out - The PrintStream to write results to.
        err - The PrintStream to write errors to.
        hist - The input history adapter for jline2.
        Throws:
        IOException - when an IO error occurs.
